utilities

Class PrinterUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • utilities.PrinterUtil

  • public class PrinterUtil
extends java.lang.Object

    Class which provides an color interface for the project. It handles printouts of the agents in different colors, aiming to improve the readability of the process.

    Attributes:
    • ANSI_RESET: reset the color scheme to the default [black].
    • colorMap: a map with the different color ANSI codes.
    • agentType: the type of the agent.
    Author:
    [DNA] Diego, Nicolas, Argentina

    • Constructor Detail

      • PrinterUtil

        public PrinterUtil(int identifier)
        Constructor of the class. The hash table is initialized in here. The identifier of the agent is need to chose the color according to the hash map created. We have defined the following identifiers:
        • WarehouseAgent: identifier 6, for purple.
        • PickerAgent: identifier 2, for red.
        • RobotAgent: identifier 3, for green.
        • ShelfAgent: identifier 7, for cyan.
        • OrderAgent: identifier 4, for yellow.
        Parameters:
        identifier - the type of agent.

    • Method Detail

      • getAgentType

        public int getAgentType()

      • print

        public void print(java.lang.String message)
        Receives a string with the message. It is a formatting for the normal method of System.out.print.
        Parameters:
        message - the message the agent will print.
